text: Gordon Hugh Willis, Jr. (May 28, 1931 – May 18, 2014) was an American cinematographer. He worked with Francis Ford Coppola. He is known for his works such as The Godfather, Manhattan, and Annie Hall. Willis died in North Falmouth, Massachusetts from metastatic cancer, aged 82.Yamato, Jen (May 18, 2014). R.I.P. ‘Godfather’ DP Gordon Willis. deadline.com. title: Gordon Willis
